title: Huipil, 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 95 x 90 cm (37 3/8 x 35 7/16 in.)
creditline: Gift of International Business Machines Corp.
description: Loosely woven white cotton plain weave with geometric patterning. Three widths sewn together. Head opening in center is reinforced with band of purple cotton solidly embroidered in polychrome cottons in bold floral pattern.
